desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老师和對策委員會学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.

desc.zh_tw: 老师带着對策委員會的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亞瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。爱露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.thai: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.ko: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_tw: 多亏對策委員會学生们大展身手，才使得亞瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得爱露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.

desc.ko: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.zh_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亞瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亞瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.jp: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.thai: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.ko: At the Black Market, the Foreclosure Task Force see their debt money being funneled into the Stygian Bank. Outraged that their hard-earned money is being used for illicit activities, the students plan a bank heist.
desc.zh_tw: 巡视黑市的對策委員會一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 巡视黑市的对策委员会一行人看到，自己所偿还的债款流入暗黑银行。当学生们得知自己努力还的钱被用来做违法勾当，便在一怒之下决定抢银行。

desc.en: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.
desc.jp: Walking for hours long, the Foreclosure Task Force and Hifumi are all exhausted. Wanting to eat some Taiyaki, Nonomi offers everyone some as well.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 走了几小时的对策委员会与日富美筋疲力尽，野宫因为想吃鲷鱼烧，于是顺带请了所有人一份。

desc.en: RABBIT小隊幫助市民解決問題。市民向他們表示感謝，指出在小鎮決定變更行政級別後，許多基礎設施就被拆除，生活不便。RABBIT小隊表示，如有需要就去公園找他們；市民給了他們烤串作為報酬。

desc.en: 眾人聽了貝雅特里謝的話，大吃一驚。他們指出色彩會將基沃託斯毀於一旦，他們的探究也將付之東流，但貝雅特里謝並不在乎。貝雅特里謝重申，她的目標是為了變成偉大的存在，抹除老師；這一目標遭到眾人一致反對。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: Beatrice is an adult of Gematria, who previously the president of Arius Branch School. She's overall a malicious adult and misguided Arius students. She once tried to sacrifice Atsuko and gave away Kivotos' location to Chroma in order to gain power from it, but then failed and directly caused the incidents of Volume Final. She got removed from Gematria due to her action leaking the Kivotos' location, which was seen as a betrayal to the organization.

desc.zh_cn_jp: 贝雅特里谢从属于盖玛特利亚的一名大人，此前亦为奥利斯学院的主席。总体而言其意图恶毒并带坏了奥利斯学生。她曾试图以将墩子作为祭品和泄露基沃托斯位置给色彩为代价，试图从后者处获得力量，但最终失败并直接导致了最终篇中的事件。其因泄露位置一事而被认为背叛了盖玛特利亚，遭其众人遗弃。

desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
